title: (Thurs Full) Was Morgan Hit On? + The Truth Behind Haunted Houses + Top 10 Chores We Hate + Amys Gets Mistaken for Uber Driver + Movies that Make Us Feel Good
itunes:title: (Thurs Full) Was Morgan Hit On? + The Truth Behind Haunted Houses + Top 10 Chores We Hate + Amys Gets Mistaken for Uber Driver + Movies that Make Us Feel Good
description:
Morgan has a random member at her gym who she's never met use an indirect way of hitting on her... and she's not a fan. Bobby explains the real reason we all think houses are haunted. Plus, top feel good movie choices, Amy was mistaken for an Uber driver by a group of girls and the top 10 chores we all hate! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
